options.title: -m  keymap
options.description: Use KEYMAP as the keymap for the duration of this command. Acceptable keymap names are emacs, emacs-standard, emacs-meta, emacs-ctlx, vi, vi-move, vi-command, and vi-insert.

options.title: -p
options.description: List functions and bindings in a form that can be reused as input.

options.title: -S
options.description: List key sequences that invoke macros and their values

options.title: -s
options.description: List key sequences that invoke macros and their values in a form that can be reused as input.

options.title: -v
options.description: List variable names and values in a form that can be reused as input.

options.title: -q  function-name
options.description: Query about which keys invoke the named function.

options.title: -u  function-name
options.description: Unbind all keys which are bound to the named function.

options.title: -x  keyseq:shell-command
options.description: Cause SHELL-COMMAND to be executed when KEYSEQ is entered.

options.title: -X
options.description: List key sequences bound with -x and associated commands in a form that can be reused as input.
